OCD.name: Premises Measurement Event Gateway
OCD.description: Gateway for sending measurements and animal tag ids to Tracker transaction editors as animal history events.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Consumable scopes
AD.description: Comma delimited list of the consumed scopes. Required scopes: measurement and the transaction ending triggering state. A scope for animal tag id is optional and used for information that has not previously been associated with an identification. (Use full scope names).

AD.name: Name of the Triggering State
AD.description: The name of the state indicating that measurement and the animal id should be forwarded as an animal history event.

AD.name: Value of the Triggering State
AD.description: The value of the state indicating that measurement and the animal id should be forwarded as an animal history event.

AD.name: Connection uri
AD.description: Identifier to associate this service with an external node in the monitor view.

AD.name: Monitor node label
AD.description: Name to label node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.
